website_summaries.verdict: This watch doesn't have a lot of features, but it's low price and toughness combine to make it a great choice for outdoor activities and workouts.
pros: Offers Casio's G-Shock toughness at a budget-friendly price
This watch features a stopwatch, alarm, calendar and countdown timer
cons: The features are limited compared to other G-Shock models and it is not tough enough to survive scuba diving
Also, the display is quite small and some users have reported quality control problems

customer_reviews.title: Fake watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a Fake G Shock watch/ Casio watch. All G Shocks watches come with a metal tin. I have 6 G Shocks and are real. You can just tell as soon as you open it. The Box has Chinese writing, none of the original boxes do. Even the instructions are just copied and reprinted and of a another model watch.
customer_reviews.author: man e

customer_reviews.title: Bought for 8 and 5 y/o. Big hit!
customer_reviews.text: Watches are a little big for little kids but for two boys dying to be just like Daddy, these are awesome. They wear them nonstop. Shower, pool, beach. Wherever. They even sleep in them. We love them. They are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: JnKBos

customer_reviews.title: Been wearing for 3 years now....very durable and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: This is an extremely durable watch at an incredible price! I have had it on non-stop for about 3 years now. I haven't had a single problem with is and have not even had to change the battery yet. It keeps perfect time and is still in sync with my cell phone's time. I have banged it into things many times, I wear it in the shower every day, wear it in salt-water when I surf, and it still looks brand new. It is everything I wanted in a watch and people usually think I paid a ton for it because it is a G-Shock. I usually just take the compliment and don't tell them that it was under $50
customer_reviews.author: Casey JonesTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Crap and they don’t stand behind with the warranty
customer_reviews.text: This watch broke within a few months of getting it. I tried contacting them about warranty but never heard anything, they said to contact where I bought it but amazon also never answered me. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: David Verdoorn

customer_reviews.title: Annoying
customer_reviews.text: This was a great watch until I noticed that the watch would always running a second slow or a second fast. After a while, the time would be completely different from the actual time. Sometimes it would be around a 5 mins difference. It was pretty annoying to continuously trying to fix the time on the watch. I'm pretty sure that there are much better watches out there. Maybe mine was a defective one, but it got annoying after a while. I now have an iwatch and I'm loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch!
customer_reviews.text: I wear this watch while working as a police officer. On more than one occasion I’ve put it through some rough situations, and it hasn’t failed me yet. It’s easy to read, the back lighting is soft and easy on the eyes, and it’s easy to change the time and date when needed. It’s super functional and fits comfortably on my wrist. Definitely recommending this watch for the price and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Malina

customer_reviews.title: Durable Gshock at a Low Price.
customer_reviews.text: Great Classic watch. Let me first say the watch is very durable and Compfortable. .I got this watch in the mail today from Amazon. Price $40.00. Great watch for the price. Good Quality nice band if you want a gshock that's for alow price this is your watch..I collect Gshocks have 21 including the Rangeman the king Gshock Gxw56-1bjf gshock Dw5600 classistance and the Dw6900, Gw6900. And to many more to mention.I also have 3 Casio protreks. .I've been wearing gshocks for 33years, since the first one came out in 1983. So take it from a gshock collector. This is a great watch for the price. Buy it you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas freyTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: THIS WATCH ROCKS!
customer_reviews.text: this watch is awesome. i bought it back when i was working in a kitchen as a dishwasher, i kept breaking cheaper watches until i broke down and bought this one, it looks good, works good, and is durable. i knew i was getting a great watch by the G-shock branding. would buy again, if i ever even have to.
customer_reviews.author: my name jeff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lower priced G-shock watch by Casio
customer_reviews.text: Very nice model. My previous G-shock was a higher end model, but I lost in while bagging leaves last Fall :-( This one is made to the same high quality standards, but not as easily readable by my old eyes as the larger display my older model had. Still, I love it and rate it 5 stars.. Update 5/10/16: I found my lost watch from last fall in the mud near some flower pots. I rinsed it off, and it still had the right time except for the daylight saving time 1 hour change! A G-2900. The newest one, in this review is still going great too.
customer_reviews.author: BobL

customer_reviews.title: Great tactical watch and features
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch and the hard plastic is obivisouly how it can be so rugged, band feels good although for me I'd really appreciate if the band was alittle longer since I'm sitting at the last notch for lose and second to last for a snug fit, or at least offer a slightly larger band in box. Other then that everything works good, looks decent but wish the design was alittle more cooler like the more expensive ones but I get why. Overall 4.5 out of 5
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great daily watch
customer_reviews.text: It is a great watch all around with a repeatable countdown timer (down to seconds, unlike most g-shocks), very helpful for tabata and hiit/hirt workouts (will beep for 10 seconds, set your timer to 30 seconds once it hits 0 it beeps for 10 seconds. So you can start at the 20 second mark and do your 6, 8, 10, 12 rounds tabata protocol or do the 30 on / 30 off, or 50 on 10 off routines) I really liked this feature on my ironman timex that I used to have, but the build quality of the g-shock is superior.
customer_reviews.author: Alessandro

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read/use, Solid watch.
customer_reviews.text: Solid watch overall. The only two things I don't like are the inability to easily reset the countdown timer, and the fact that the old watches were easier to set by using both the start/stop button and the split/reset button. Otherwise this watch fits well and is easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Not the real deal
customer_reviews.text: Not the official 1659 movement. Appears to be cheap Chinese counterfeit. Watch is slightly smaller than the two models I've owned since 2002 and the wrist band is too small for presumably non-Chinese people. Box open and watch running. If this is Casio's new model, shame on them for cheaping out.
customer_reviews.author: Atcavage

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, durable, easy to read! Great for anyone who's active!
customer_reviews.text: I have a big watch collection, however I needed something to wear while working out, running, etc. that wasn't big or bulky and this more than fits the bill. I love the durability, light weight, easy to read display, and overall feel of this watch. It doesn't get in the way of your wrists natural path of movement when doing bench presses, push ups, or anything that causes your wrist to bend. I am very happy with this purchase and for the price it's a no brainer. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Barry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent CASIO Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one after the band on my 15 year old CASIO (exact same model) started to crack and break. I opted to buy a new one as the price of replacement bands is STUPID expensive for an original. The display on the new one has a different contrast - better to see in daylight. Now keep in mind that in 15 YEARS - I only had to replace the battery ONCE - so I am hoping the new one is of equal performance.
customer_reviews.author: WV Subscriber

customer_reviews.title: In all honesty, it’s awesome and reliable!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great basic G-Shock watch. Nothing fancy and it’s easy to adjust and easy to set the time. The night light is great as well. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: I've had this watch for approximately 9 months now and it's still going strong.
customer_reviews.text: Before I would only use metal watches for work and I would chip the glass or break the band but since I've gotten this one I don't have to worry about that anymore. I literally wear this watch 24/7 rarely take it off just to wash it and underneath in the shower. I work construction and it's held up quite well, no damage yet.
customer_reviews.author: Chato92

customer_reviews.title: 7 years in, still tickin'.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch on Amazon almost 7 years ago, and this thing still kicks so much ass. I bang it into walls, get it wet all the time, and it still functions perfectly, feels great to wear, and essentially still looks the same. I'm really impressed by this thing, and I hope to wear it for many more years.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: I love it...after a lot of research
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. I was torn between this and the Ironman line. Ultimately I chose the Gshock because from what I read, it appeared to holdup to abuse better. Now that I've owned it for about 5 months I would totally agree....it holds up great....still looks new. I wear it to work, and have hit it on doors and walls, and swam in it multiple times.....still looks brand new. I think next time I will go for the atomic with solar...buy I wanted to make sure I liked the feel of the watch first.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin & Tara Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: So fifteen years ago I purchased this watch for my husband and it has worked perfectly all that time. When he was changing the band he broke a bracket and could no longer use the watch...but it still works! So he wanted another one just like the old one, he loves this watch! very accurate and obviously a great value!
customer_reviews.author: anita

customer_reviews.title: My ultimate watch!
customer_reviews.text: It’s the side adjustment buttons to set time and alarms that I struggled, so deep that you have to press really hard to activate it! Initial setup of date also confusing! But in general, I love this watch which will replace my existing 5 recently purchased watches!
customer_reviews.author: Super M

customer_reviews.title: Great watch. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our 14 yrs old son. 5’ 7” and 122lbs. He loves this watch. He went through several other watches...Casio, Timex, a few Chinese watches, a Fitbit, and a solar watch. None of them lasted. This G-shock seems to be going the distance. Fits well. Not too big. I’m so is very active, and the G-shock is keeping up. Would recommend. Would buy again. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Family of 11

customer_reviews.title: 4.75 stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like this watch, the durability and appearance. I have bumped it multiple times with no scratches. My only dislike is that the timer runs fast, admittedly I am quite anal about my watches syncing with my phone, computer, car etc. However, even with it being a tid bit fast, it isn't enough to make me give it any less than 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Allthingstennessee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set it & forget it watch!  A trouble free, accurate and super durable watch.
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing not to like about this watch as far as I'm concerned. Very accurate, no pretense, very affordable and all you need and nothing you don't. When you just need the time and not a lot of extras this is your watch. You won't find a better watch for your money in the forty to fifty dollar range imho.
customer_reviews.author: D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Funny thing is the only thing that stopped working was ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed a decent cheap watch to time my daily runs. Basically only need it for running a timer. The first one I got stopped working within the first 3 weeks of use! Funny thing is the only thing that stopped working was the timer!!!! Amazon sent out a replacement fast though. So far this one is still working but it's only been a couple of weeks with the new one.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Stands up to 14 year old teen age boy's lack of care! Keeps on ticking....
customer_reviews.text: Casio has always been one of my favorite brands of watches. they hold up well and last a long time. I really purchased this watch for my 14 year old grandson who is very hard on any thing as he does not seem to know his own strength or that items break when dropped or thrown about. This watch as lasted for the past year without fail. It has been dropped numerous times, tossed aside, sat on, lost and then found. It has not had an easy life with a 14 year old teen age boy yet is survives and continues to work. Yay! Good Price, good value!
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: this is a great quality product
customer_reviews.text: this is a great quality product. I have this item for 5 years and still work in great perfect condition. The only disappointment I have is the belt replacement for this specific item are a little too high in price other than that this is a Shock quality item .
customer_reviews.author: drivas909

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in open box
customer_reviews.text: This watch just arrived and the box the watch came in was opened already. It appears it was used before. There is no film cover on the watch screen and the time and date are already counting. Very disappointing because I'm taking this on a trip in a couple of days to give it as a gift. I can't return it or have a replacement. I'm giving it a one start for now. I'll up the star later if I hear the watch will be working as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Deer Wala

customer_reviews.title: Truly awesome & reliable!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this watch for about 5 years and just the other day I lost it. I was truly devastated as this watch was truly a necessity in my everyday life. It does literally everything I need in a watch. From telling time, knowing what day it is (even day of the week), stopwatch, alarms, and it also even chimes every hour. It's not too small nor too big. A perfect everyday watch, I just had to purchase another. I would recommend this watch to anyone who wants a reliable and handy watch for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Luigi Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Next day he went back to that same off sure snorkel spot and found it sitting on the ocean floor working just fine! Absolutely a
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend who works on a snorkel boat. One day he was pulling a passenger back to the boat and they managed to rip it off his wrist in their panic. Next day he went back to that same off sure snorkel spot and found it sitting on the ocean floor working just fine! Absolutely amazing watches! I have a teal one I use for scuba diving and I will never buy any other watch again
customer_reviews.author: darby

customer_reviews.title: Tough but easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this watch! It was a perfect birthday gift! It is water resistant so he can wash it off when he gets it dirty during work. It has gone through a few hits from different things as he has worked on machinery.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Band broke at nothing
customer_reviews.text: Not the old indestructible g-shock we use to know and love. Was not very durable as it fell off my arm.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Ray Smith

customer_reviews.title: Durable, low-price, still on first battery after four years
customer_reviews.text: Have had this watch since February 2012, didn't use the backlight much but still ticking. Has gotten every bodily fluid imaginable on it from my time working in the emergency room, can take the heavy duty practically carcinogenic cleaning wipes without issues, have repeatedly bumped into doorknobs and counters without a scratch or a hiccup. Not the flashiest looking G-Shock but enthusiasts will notice it right away and immediately shower you with compliments. Yes it costs more than the $11.99 Fanmis S-Shock for sale on Amazon but I'd imagine this is much more durable and will actually run for more than a year or two.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Frappy

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch! Not a Fake
customer_reviews.text: This watch right out of the box is super nice. Feels very solid and durable. I am super super tough on watches and this is my second G Shock since 2004.
customer_reviews.author: K Nelson

customer_reviews.title: He is very pleased with the size and fit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a birthday gift for my husband. He wears it to work . The watch is solid made and able to withstand all weather and work conditions. He is very pleased with the size and fit. The digital displays are easy to read. The band is adjustable and comfortable. I figured if this watch was quality enough for the military it would be perfect for my husband as a merchant mariner.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie

customer_reviews.title: I like it, a lot of people like it, and for good reason.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned dozens of Casio watches in my time. While this may be just a step or two up from their most simplistic of offerings, I am very fond of this module. I use each and every feature it has and find its aesthetics very appealing but more importantly I know that this watch will function when the poop hits the fan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good basic Gshock watch
customer_reviews.text: It’s just a good basic Gshock watch. Nothing fancy, but it works and is holding up to wearing to work every day.
customer_reviews.author: Sheepdog

customer_reviews.title: Quality by Casio
customer_reviews.text: Great watch- durable, nice looking and easy to use. Now that's not saying much- I'm of the type that will set it once and never touch it again. But for a timekeeper, it is a godsend. Not expensive, by far, yet fulfills everything everyone looking for a utilitarian watch will want. I set it once, right when I got it, with atomic time, and haven't touched it since. Keeps time extremely accurately, running (for me, at least) at most about a second or so fast on a weekly basis. Overall 5 stars and effortlessly worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Very functional!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a G-shock for a long time but I refused to spend $200-300 bucks for a Casio watch.... So i searched and searched and found this one. Price is right, it keeps time very well and it is bomb proof! I use it as a work watch and I beat the mess out of it, and it cleans up just like new every time. It is one of the cheaper priced G-shocks but it looks fairly good in my opinion. It has all the features I need, date, time, second count, and day of the week.
customer_reviews.author: harold segars

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up alarms or change time. Very durable.
customer_reviews.text: I had a Garmin Vivosmart fitness tracker watch that needed charging every 3 days which i'd forget to charge and unlike other watches I have owned before this is easy to change alarm and time without having to carry a user manual in your wallet like I used to do.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Westwood

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this watch now for over a month. I've taken it on a Color Run where it got covered in "Paint" (Corn Starch dyed) and came out spotless after a quick dip in the pool. I wear this watch mountain biking almost every day and it takes a beating on the trails. The styling of the watch still allows me to wear it around the office in "Office Attire" and it compliments each outfit perfectly. Being an Amazon Prime Member means that I received it in less than 48 hours delivered to my door. My overall customer experience with this watch and with Amazon is one that I've already shared and encouraged others to Buy this watch from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Katie and J

customer_reviews.title: A Gift for my Niece
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my niece in the Philippines who is a civil engineer. A very bright young lady. She requested a G-Shock watch when we visit them next year. So I'm afraid I cannot give a review, but if it is anything like my G-Shock watches, they're outstanding in style and service. I own at least half a dozen G-Shock watches varying in style and color. All have performed well and I wouldn't trade them for anything.
customer_reviews.author: Executive Assistant

customer_reviews.title: Extremely durable and stylish design.
customer_reviews.text: I am still wearing this watch to this day, it is an investment that is very stylish yet imperative to have. It has literally has been dropped and banged countless of time but it is still intact, functional, and stylish wrist watch.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Liu

customer_reviews.title: 8 years and counting
customer_reviews.text: 8 years and counting - still looks and works as good as new, and still using original battery, 2nd G-Shock in 30 years, first one lasted over 20 yrs.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G

customer_reviews.title: Great long lasting watch.
customer_reviews.text: Have had this watch now going on 2.5 years and it has withstood a tremendous amount of use and abuse. The little plastic pieces that go over the screws come off from time to time but nothing that serious. Really good watch.
customer_reviews.author: thisguy

customer_reviews.title: The G-Shock DW9052-1V is a great watch. Excellent everday watch that is built for ...
customer_reviews.text: The G-Shock DW9052-1V is a great watch.Excellent everday watch that is built for the outdoors or water sports. I owned my last one for 15 years and it still works but protective guard came apart. Great price, fast shipment and built to last. Very dependable and good stop watch.
customer_reviews.author: lennyd

customer_reviews.title: Looks and simplicity
customer_reviews.text: Watch is very simple not complicated nice for going out or just for work I’m a stock associate so I usually get cuts but this watch is great bc I am confident on doing a better job at work, the only cut back is the strap is to small
customer_reviews.author: Gab

customer_reviews.title: No cons here!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend. He loves it! He's already gone swimming with it and it's still going. Easy to read, set, and use. No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jena

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great watch, I bought this in January of 2015. More than 3 years in and this watch has taken a licking and kept on ticking. Just to let you know, I'm talking more than 3 years of abuse from a 15-18 year old male. The watch has seen everything from the ocean, freezing temperatures, 100+ temps, repeated bashings and yet looks almost new. The only damage I've managed to do is: the pin that holds the band in once popped out but was easily put back in and I've given it a minuscule scratch on the top of the glass. Heck the red/white letters haven't even worn off yet.
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: It's the basic watch. Good for getting dirty and beating up. The part where the band attaches to the face is thin in width, which you cant really tell online. I returned mine and paid an extra $35 for a mineral crystal face, leather band, with Japanese quartz movement Nixon watch. The G Shock Has plastic risers to help airrate the wrist but they look goofy/bulky. I took mine off and looked better but made the wrist sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Love my G-Shock
customer_reviews.text: It's a G-Shock, what can I say, they're awesome. These watches will last a long time till they dry rot off your arm. Then for 45 or 50 bucks get another one.
customer_reviews.author: J S

customer_reviews.title: The Kids Love this Watch!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this watch! All the core functions work well. They appreciate the extremely bright light and enjoy counting down the seconds until online classes are over.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great watch !!
customer_reviews.text: This watch arrived very quickly and works great just as all the other Casio G Shock watches I have owned ... very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Alemanv71

customer_reviews.title: Toughest Watches Ever
customer_reviews.text: Rugged durable watch. I’ve been wearing G-Shock watches since I was in the Navy and they’re the best if you need a watch that can stand up to a lot of punishment.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Deyton

customer_reviews.title: Still a great watch
customer_reviews.text: Got it today as expected...Is a very good watch...Does what it’s supposed to do...Basic functions...For the price it’s a great bargain...Had one years ago and it was very dependable...Highly recommend...
customer_reviews.author: edward hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Casio watches never disappoint
customer_reviews.text: G-shock watches are durable work for all my needs. But 'too many features' add 'too much bulk' on the wrist and just aren't used much if at all. The simpler models just look 'cheap'. I've never been able to find the happy balance of the two.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... and just changed the battery which was not that easy. But no problems at all in the years ...
customer_reviews.text: Had for two years and just changed the battery which was not that easy. But no problems at all in the years I have had it. Good cheap watch.
customer_reviews.author: Guinness

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and durable watch
customer_reviews.text: I like this model because it’s not Flava Flav sized like the newer G Shock models and it’s still a rugged watch. Cheap enough that if it happens to break I could buy another and feel fine about it.
customer_reviews.author: thomas bieler

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting to get one after seeing my husband go through Army and LEO training/activities for years and his stood up well. I'm a 5'6'' female with average wrists and mine fits great. I wear it all the time and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Its built like a Tank!
customer_reviews.text: Dw9052 is a basic G Shock but excellent watch. I bought it for 35$ and I did not regret. Its a great watch for everday use. I am a Dentist and use it as everyday watch. I wear casual clothes. The watch is very light and very reliable. The digit numbers are not very big but I can see the time without problem. The light is perfect. For those who want a watch without frills I recommend this one. Its a bargain. Using it for 2 years and still going strong. Its built like a tank.
customer_reviews.author: Altin Alihajdari

customer_reviews.title: FAKE, FAKE, and FAKE #cheapripoff
customer_reviews.text: Fake G-SHOCK! Came in open flimsy box with Chinese writing and didn’t even have protective film on screen! Will be returning. Knew price was too good to be true! BUYERS BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: Davin J. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Casio G-Shock
customer_reviews.text: Friends: I started wearing these watches about 30 years ago while an Officer in the US Navy, then a NAUI Divemaster, then a Professional Engineer then a high caliber Alpinist, then a motorcyclist and cowboy in the remote Sangre de Cristo mountain range of Colorado. I lost the last one I had and bought this one as a replacement. Over the years the band has become more comfortable with this latest model. You can Google my name to Learn more..... Arthur von Boennighausen
customer_reviews.author: Arthur von Boennighausen

customer_reviews.title: He love how manly and rough it looks
customer_reviews.text: I got this watch for my 9 year old son. He love how manly and rough it looks, and it actually looks better in person than in the pictures. The materials feel expensive and the push light is incredibly bright.
customer_reviews.author: Edgardo amado

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift , but they had one before and loved so much I send him another since he lost the first one
customer_reviews.author: Nelly Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Classic it is!
customer_reviews.text: Classic it is! I own several G-Shocks and this is a favorite. Comfortable, convenient/intuitive controls, stylish and timeless. Looks even better than the pix. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Wasatchmo

customer_reviews.title: G Shock Bargain
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch as a gift for our 24 yo neice who recently graduated from school. She was asking for one at the holidays, but we never really shopped for one. I couldn't believe the prices of some of these watches now. I couldn't afford to spend alot, so I checked Amazon to see which ones were affordable, and came across this one. For under $50, I got a great watch and she LOVED it. She was so excited to open it, I don't think she thought we remembered. Anyway, it works well for her, and we got black to go with everything. Now that she has a full time job, she can buy herself different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Bargainista

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: Love the gshock! This is the real deal! You will not be disappointed. There are fancier units, but this one is great for my needs. Looks great on as well.
customer_reviews.author: R12d2

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. After a few months it does seem to be running about a minute fast. The grey rubber piece like to come a part, but you can snap them back on. Other than that I've got nothing bad to say . It's held up they bangs and plenty of water
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: ... 9 year old son turned out to be an excellent gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 9 year old son turned out to be an excellent gift idea. I wanted something that was durable and last. This looks like a watch that he will grow up with. He loved the watch and it has been very durable.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Classic brand watch
customer_reviews.text: I heard a lot of great things about these sporty watches so I had to purchase one for myself. This is a great watch to wear when working out or simply to the gym to be stylish. The display screen is easy to read as well. If this is your first watch of this kind make sure you read the directions. It is a great price and comfortable on the wrist. I recommend this item to any watch lover.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona Wright

customer_reviews.title: Amazing watch, even more amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 yr old son wanted a g-shock like Dad. This was less then $40 and he loves it. He has had it over a year, never and I mean never takes it off and being a g-shock it looks new. I would wear this without question and I see many men have this same watch. Don't see how you could go wrong. Also the night light is super bright if that a consideration. I have 2 g-shocks, one was $99 and one was $149 - no difference in quality and this is less then $40!
customer_reviews.author: DLR

customer_reviews.title: Basic watch that performs as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive watch that does all the basics. I use it as the watch I wear for my daily walk and when I swim laps and around town. My prior Casio lasted many years and they make a very dependable product.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence G. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Buy the more expensive Gshock.
customer_reviews.text: Its a durable watch and Ive had the brad before. However this one did make my skin raw and red where I wore it. Its worth paying the extra money and getting one of the more expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé actually had one many years ago and I just so happened to buy him this because I thought it was a good watch, turns out I was right! It seems to do the job!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect starter.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect watch to dip your toes in as far as the g-shock line up. I wore this to work and stood up through all the knicks, scratches, splashes, and even had it submerged for periods of time at a waterpark recently. Which lead me to upgrade to a nicer one. Easy to navigate, and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: G Shock DW9052-1V
customer_reviews.text: This was for my son for his grade school graduation. I have been wearing G-Shocks since the late 80's / early 90's and keep upgrading to whatever the newest ones are. I like to keep up with the newest technology in these things and actually just got a Master of G "Rangeman" for myself. This one I think, is a perfect starter for a kid who's gear really takes a beating on a regular basis. Wonderful price point and tuff as nails. G-Shock Watches Rule The Outdoors!
customer_reviews.author: V3Tek

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: I received this watch today. Typical Casio G-Shock home run, the yellow accents really zing. The only thing I might do in the future is add a nylon band, either one of Casio's or get a set of adapters and use a Zulu band, but that's my opinion only. I like the DW9052 series, Probably the best $50.00 I spent on a watch
customer_reviews.author: Richard M.

customer_reviews.title: A classic
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most popular G-Shocks and it shows: classic look, all of the standard functions, and truly bulletproof. Do some Googling if you want to read the miracles about the types of abuse this thing holds up to: being dropped into boiling water, getting run over by a car, etc. Makes a great watch for anyone who is active or afraid of bashing up an expensive one. I use it for working out, washing the car (plastic won't scratch the car's paint), and when I do stuff around the house.
customer_reviews.author: dparm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the construction worker in your life!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only watch my husband will wear. He is a construction worker and is always around heavy duty materials, dirt, grime, etc. This brand of watch is the only one that stands the test of his career. He has the alarms scheduled for lunch, breaks, and wake up. This watch has never let him down. He wears it everywhere, including the pool! Never fails.
customer_reviews.author: LeslieNT

customer_reviews.title: Solid watch
customer_reviews.text: Its a cool watch. Felt little tough while setting up for the first time. 99% of the features i don't use on a day today basis. Still nice to have those things. ALready 30 days with this
customer_reviews.author: SOG

customer_reviews.title: Nearly Indestructable!
customer_reviews.text: Durable, as close to indestructible watch you will ever find. You will never have to worry about banging this watch around. Can be used for scuba diving as the watch can go 200m, or 660ft. deep. Suitable for high impact water sports and scuba diving at depths not requiring helium gas. You don't have to worry about damaging this watch. Does everything and more the most expensive watches do for ma fraction of the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Fast Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: Bought one fresh out of basic training lasted 5 years with rough treatment, watch band finally broke it was time for a second one
customer_reviews.author: Danny!

customer_reviews.title: Very cool watch!
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch! Highly recommend! Does everything it says, and it durable and high quality!
customer_reviews.author: RRIII

customer_reviews.title: I got this watch for a beach trip a few months ago and it works great. Went surfing with it
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to wait a few months before writing a review. I got this watch for a beach trip a few months ago and it works great. Went surfing with it, ran with it, and even played sand volleyball with it and it held its expectations. Now when I go hiking or swimming, I always where this watch. I also set alarms so when I know when to start heading down the mountain or when it's time to get out of the water. If you are looking for a simple yet extremely durable watch that can handle your outdoor lifestyle... this is the watch to get.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Blose

customer_reviews.title: robust
customer_reviews.text: Very classy and a cool watch. I bought it as a gift for my nephew. He loved it and he still wears it till today. the best part of the watch is that its shock, water and dust resistant. I always love casio watches.
customer_reviews.author: Sonu

customer_reviews.title: It takes a beating and keeps on ticking!
customer_reviews.text: I have waited years to write this review so I can really see this rugged watch go through some trials and tribulations. Since then this watch has been run over, brought into the pool numerous times, rained on, snowed on, and caught in the moving parts of the living room recliner. After all this the only thing I have had to replace on it is the battery once. Hats off to Casio!! Don't waste your money on some crazy high end watch endorsed by the Navy Seals. Pick up one of these work horses, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: SSGBRAVO

customer_reviews.title: Will last til the Second Coming
customer_reviews.text: I've had one of these watches for years. When my battery ran out of my last one, I stupidly listened to my friend who said to just throw it away. Big mistake. That watch is sitting in some landfill with the ability to suck that insult up and to start running again. All it needs is a $10 battery. Ten bucks compared to 50. Stupid move. Anyway, I expect this watch to last til the Second Coming, too.
customer_reviews.author: Spamclam

customer_reviews.title: Accurate as heck I havent lost a minute yet in ...
customer_reviews.text: Accurate as heck I havent lost a minute yet in months. 2 thigs I have an issue with. the buttons can be hard to push and the numbers alot smaller the I would preffer.
customer_reviews.author: Viktor Pavlovic

customer_reviews.title: 7 years later.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch 7 years ago. I haven’t replaced the battery, it’s been through multiple mud runs, and everything still works perfectly. Would 1000% buy again and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good watch fair price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boy friend as one of his birthday presents. He doesn't like it too big and this one seems to have a lot positive reviews. I was correct. It does look good but not too big and heavy. He is a swimmer and we have a lot outdoor activities so this is a great watch for all that. High recommend to someone who wants similar watch. No negative comments on the watch at all.
customer_reviews.author: Liya Cheruax

customer_reviews.title: Well I have had this watch for almost two years ...
customer_reviews.text: Well I have had this watch for almost two years now and I can honestly say its one of the toughest watches I have ever owned. Its made it thru a deployment, many days in the saltwater fishing, thru mud and sand and have even gotten paint on it. Everything comes right off and still runs just as well as the day i got it. Buy this watch, you know you want to. Trust me. 10 out of 10!
customer_reviews.author: Triston

customer_reviews.title: Always CASIO
customer_reviews.text: This will be the 7th G-Shock I have purchased ( over 25 years or so). The wrist band always gives out first and I had such difficulty replacing the band on the first watch that I just opted for a new one each time. Can't go wrong for 40 bucks but I have already ordered a replacement band and have some instructions to follow thanks to the Amazon customer reviews on this product. The bright blue flash of light from the red G on the face has got me through many dark tight spots. Alarm clock is second best feature.
customer_reviews.author: Former Captain

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting something that did not seem like a child might be wearing it
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting something that did not seem like a child might be wearing it, but my husband seemed to like it more than I did. I really just bought it for him to wear to work anyways, so it served its purpose. I would go with an upgrade if you are looking for something with a more rugged appearance, there is a lot of bulky plastic on it. I have viewed some of the other more expensive ones sense getting this one, and will probably get another one with the metal looking buttons and screws, and with bigger numbers.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Blair

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my husband and was easy to set up overall except for the alarm, we couldn't figure out how to deactivate the hourly alarm so it beeps every hour, other than that, great watch and great price!
customer_reviews.author: Juliane Medeiros

customer_reviews.title: Great for anyone rough on watches!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second G-Shock. My first lasted almost 15 years. I did have to replace a split bezel once and when having the battery changed I will no longer do this myself as I lost the great 100% waterproof ability after changing the battery myself even with new o rings. I am very hard on watches but could not kill my last one! I finally retired it when the dial was so worn out it was hard to read! That is why I bought a G-Shock again and at Amazon's price of $42 you can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Bogart

customer_reviews.title: Depend on Casio's G Shock series.
customer_reviews.text: My first G shock I bought at the ship's store and it lasted me for years despite the pounding I gave iit annd constant exposure to every kind of condition and immersion in salt water. The only part of the watch to give out before the battery was the band and like I said. ..that took YEARS! I recommend this watch to anyone who needs a good looking timepiece they can rely on without having to baby it.
customer_reviews.author: Dante Alighieri

customer_reviews.title: my workhorse
customer_reviews.text: I love watches and have 10+, ranging from this that costed less than $40 to a Rolex wit a wide representation of mostly swiss chronometers in between. I got to tell you, this is my working use every day in the harshest conditions / go to the beach / snorkel / pool watch. Never clean it, just abuse it, drop it a million times, hit it while wearing it a lot and has never failed. Read the reviews and took my chances. Has worked perfectly for the last 3 years. Guess it's a hit or miss thing. Will rebuy once battery dies (but there's no indication of thar happening in the near future and that's 3+ years!!!)
customer_reviews.author: jose

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. Had my other for 4 years (exactly, oddly enough) and lost it.. Replaced it with a Luminox and for some reason a $400 watch wouldn't even hold the time. Found this G Shock again and prefer it over any watch I think you could throw at me. Can't beat it for the price, very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H

customer_reviews.title: For my son...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son after I received my DW 6900 MS. He liked my watch so much, I got this one for him for a great report card. He LOVES this watch! I am pretty sure it will withstand anything he can dish out (he is 8). Its big on his wrist, but he doesn't care. It looks fine... I wanted to get a watch that would last him a few years and after much research, this one fit the bill... especially the price point!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Survived and a hour and a half in the washer and dryer!
customer_reviews.text: Survived 30 minutes in the washer and 1 hour in the dryer. This wasn't an experiment but my son left inside the pocket of his jeans. Anyways when took the clothes we found it. It was hot we couldn't touch it but it was fine. No signs of water inside. I left it outside to cool down. No damage whatsoever. Excellent job Casio. I don't write reviews but i had to this time.
customer_reviews.author: Confirmed Anazon Customer

product_meta.title: Casio Men's 'G-Shock' Quartz Resin Sport Watch
product_meta.description:
With full 200M WR, Shock Resistant, 24Hr stopwatch and countdown timer, standard issue never looked this good. Black resin band digital watch with black face.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :1 x 1 x 1 inches; 4.8 Ounces
 * Manufacturer recommended age :15 years and up
 * Item model number :DW9052-1V
 * Department :TRAVEL GEAR
 * Batteries :1 Lithium Metal batteries required.
 * Date First Available :December 21, 2002
 * Manufacturer :Casio
 * ASIN :B000GAYQLI

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #1,873 in Sports & Outdoors (See Top 100 in Sports & Outdoors)  *  #2 inWomen's Outdoor Recreation Sport Watches 
    *  #2 inMen's Outdoor Recreation Sport Watches 
    *  #2 inWomen's Sport Watches 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.7 out of 5 stars4,175 ratings With full 200M WR, Shock Resistant, 24Hr stopwatch and countdown timer, standard issue never looked this good. Black resin band digital watch with black face.
feature_bullets: Made in the USA or Imported
Shock-resistant sport watch featuring multi-function rectangular dial with afterglow EL backlight, daily alarm, and countdown timer
48.5 millimeters resin case with mineral dial window
Functions include multi-function alarm, 1/100-second stopwatch, hourly time signal, auto calendar, and 12/24 hour formats
Water resistant to 200 m (660 ft): In general, suitable for professional marine activity and serious surface water sports, but not scuba diving.
